DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Observational Study Prematurely Born Preschool Children : Assessment Lung Function Parameters
DOC.detailed_description: The PRE-AR project longitudinal observational study . The primary objective assessment lung function parameter late preterm preschool child . Pulmonary function test perform .
DOC.criteria: Case group Premature birth < 37 week 5 year old ≤ Age ≥ 3 year old Control group Fullterm birth 5 year old ≤ Age ≥ 3 year old Exclusion Criteria group : Pulmonary bronchodysplasia ( BDP ) Acute respiratory infection Immunological metabolic system disease Malformation upper respiratory tract Topical systemic therapy , antibiotic , antihistaminics corticosteroid , previous 30 day Patients neurological pathology Patients able perform lung function test
